pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:1.11: _Khajjaka_. According to [Sp.2.615]() this refers to all non-staple foods: _Ettha mūlakhādanīyādi sabbaṁ gahetabbaṁ_, “Here the non-staple foods which are roots, etc. may all be taken.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk39:1.13: _Uttaribhaṅga_. According to [Vin-vn-ṭ.1907](), this is just another word for _byañjana_: _uttaribhaṅgaṁ nāma byañjanaṁ_. _Byañjana_ seems to refer to curries apart from the standard bean-curries, which are called _sūpa_.
